ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: While I agree that Verant is sick & twisted, you are confusing two quests.  The Evil Eye is part of the Observer Staff Quest and originates at an Observitory.
ygData.messageBody:
While I agree that Verant is sick & twisted, you are confusing two quests. The Evil
Eye is part of the Observer Staff Quest and originates at an Observitory. The
Telescope Lens Quest orignates in the Wizards? Guild and it requires you to get four
lenses. None of them are on Borxx. Two are given to you by the observitories. One
is obtained by killing a 14ish (and nasty) DE in Freeport, and the last is on this
missing gnome. Please also note that this quest will not be given to wizards above
level 12.

> Believe it , verant has this sick and twisted thing about making quests
> ungettable at higher levels, and impossible for low levels to actually
> solve, for instance this quest. one of the lens you need tog et from
> Borxx, a level *30*+ Evil Eye. With verants normal sense of rewards well
> get 20 exp pts, a faction adjustment and a tarnished dagger as reward,
> note this is a step up from the usual rusty dagger they give us.
> another example (again gnome) get tergons spellbook, OK this spawns on
> a level 18 or so mob... your reward for solving the quest? a level 4
> mage spell.
